Package org.lanter.lan4gate

Interface ILan4Gate

All Known Implementing Classes:
Lan4Gate
public interface ILan4Gate
This interface encapsulates ECR protocol LAN-4Gate

  • Method Details

    • setEcrNumber

      void setEcrNumber​(int ecrNumber)
      Sets logical ecr number
      Parameters:
      ecrNumber - Logical ECR number, used for communication with terminal. Value in range [1,999]

    • getEcrNumber

      int getEcrNumber()
      Return logical ecr number
      Returns:
      Logical ECR number, used for communication with terminal. Value in range [1,999]

    • setCommunication

      void setCommunication​(ICommunication communication) throws java.lang.RuntimeException
      Sets new ICommunication for communication with terminal
      Parameters:
      communication - object, implements ICommunication
      Throws:
      java.lang.RuntimeException - if communication cannot be changed

    • getCommunication

      ICommunication getCommunication()
      Return current communication
      Returns:
      Current communication or null

    • addResponseCallback

      void addResponseCallback​(IResponseCallback callback)
      Add listener for IResponseCallback
      Parameters:
      callback - Object, implements interface IResponseCallback

    • removeResponseCallback

      void removeResponseCallback​(IResponseCallback callback)
      Remove registered IResponseCallback listener
      Parameters:
      callback - Registered IResponseCallback object

    • addCommunicationCallback

      void addCommunicationCallback​(ICommunicationCallback callback)
      Add listener for ICommunicationCallback
      Parameters:
      callback - Object, implements interface ICommunicationCallback

    • removeCommunicationCallback

      void removeCommunicationCallback​(ICommunicationCallback callback)
      Remove registered ICommunicationCallback listener
      Parameters:
      callback - Registered ICommunicationCallback object

    • addNotificationCallback

      void addNotificationCallback​(INotificationCallback callback)
      Add listener for INotificationCallback
      Parameters:
      callback - Object, implements interface INotificationCallback

    • removeNotificationCallback

      void removeNotificationCallback​(INotificationCallback callback)
      Remove registered INotificationCallback listener
      Parameters:
      callback - Registered INotificationCallback object

    • start

      void start()
      Start protocol communication. After correct start ICommunicationCallback.communicationStarted() will be called

    • isStarted

      boolean isStarted()
      Returns start state of protocol communication
      Returns:
      True, if already and correct started

    • stop

      void stop()
      Stop protocol communication. After correct start ICommunicationCallback.communicationStopped() will be called

    • getPreparedRequest

      IRequest getPreparedRequest​(OperationsList operation)
      Return prepared IRequest. Fields EcrNumber and OperationCode already sets
      Parameters:
      operation - one of OperationsList
      Returns:
      null, if request cannot be created

    • sendRequest

      void sendRequest​(IRequest request)
      Send new request to terminal
      Parameters:
      request - Prepared object, implements IRequest

    • getPreparedNotification

      INotification getPreparedNotification​(NotificationsList notification)
      Return prepared INotification. Field NotificationCode already sets
      Parameters:
      notification - one of NotificationsList
      Returns:
      null, if notification cannot be created

    • sendInteraction

      void sendInteraction​(IInteraction interaction)
      Send new interaction to tereminal
      Parameters:
      interaction - Prepared object, implements IInteraction
